a.js(11,12): error TS2503: Cannot find namespace 'Outer'.

    var Outer = class O {
        m(x, y) { }
    }
    Outer.Inner = class I {
        n(a, b) { }
    
    }
    /** @type {Outer} */
               ~~~~~
